title: See the video the Longhorns watched before they beat Oklahoma
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest See the video the Longhorns watched before the beat Oklahoma Texas is really getting every bit they can out of their stunning upset win over Oklahoma, and can you blame them? It’s been a tough season for the Longhorns. They should celebrate this one. It’s been a tough season for the Longhorns. They should celebrate this one.   WFAA.com: http://on.wfaa.com/1LwBcsa   Join the Conversation To   See the video the Longhorns watched before the beat Oklahoma Nate Scott, USA TODAY Sports/For The Win! 8:34 p.m. CDT October 15, 2015 Texas Longhorns head coach Charlie Strong celebrates winning the game against the Oklahoma Sooners during the Red River rivalry at Cotton Bowl Stadium. (Photo: Tim Heitman-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Texas is really getting every bit they can out of their stunning upset win over Oklahoma, and can you blame them? It’s been a tough season for the Longhorns. They should celebrate this one. 
After they posted a highlight video of the game , the Longhorns have now released the pregame pump-up video they showed the team, which is heavy on The Dark Knight. 
Watch the video below or here to see just how the Longhorns got hyped up to beat the No. 9 team in the country. Read or Share this story: http://on.wfaa.com/1LwBcsa TOP VIDEOS
